results.title: beta-blocker prescription is associated with lower cumulative risk of knee osteoarthritis and knee pain consultations in primary care: a propensity score-matched cohort study
results.text_hl: Cumulative hazard of (A) @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@knee OA@@@ and (B) @<m>DISEASE_Patellofemoral_Pain_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D046788 @@@knee pain@@@ consultation in @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@-exposed and -unexposed participants
